items.name: func JSGlobalContextCreate(JSClassRef!) -> JSGlobalContextRef!
items.desc: Creates a global JavaScript execution context.

items.name: func JSGlobalContextCreateInGroup(JSContextGroupRef!, JSClassRef!) -> JSGlobalContextRef!
items.desc: Creates a global JavaScript execution context in the provided context group.

items.name: func JSGlobalContextRetain(JSGlobalContextRef!) -> JSGlobalContextRef!
items.desc: Retains a global JavaScript execution context.

items.name: func JSGlobalContextRelease(JSGlobalContextRef!)
items.desc: Releases a global JavaScript execution context.

items.name: func JSGlobalContextCopyName(JSGlobalContextRef!) -> JSStringRef!
items.desc: Gets a copy of the name of a context.

items.name: func JSGlobalContextSetName(JSGlobalContextRef!, JSStringRef!)
items.desc: Sets the remote debugging name for a context.
